### Installation


The `SummarizeByGroup` package can be installed directly from Github with


```{r Installation}
devtools::install_github("stat545ubc-2023/SummarizeByGroup")
```


### Examples

Using the `Insurace` dataset from the `MASS` package as an example data frame

```{r Examples}
library(MASS)
fn.Summarize.by.Group(Insurance, 'District', 'Claims')
fn.Summarize.by.Group(Insurance, 'District', 'Holders')
```
